meanings.definition: Move up and down with jerky movements.
meanings.sent1: The old truck was jouncing along the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: The children were jouncing on the trampoline in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The jouncing car ride made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The jouncing boat ride felt like being on a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The jouncing motion of the train was both thrilling and tiring.

meanings.sent1: The ball kept jouncing off the walls in the small room.
meanings.sent2: The horse was jouncing its rider as it galloped across the field.
meanings.sent3: The jouncing music made everyone dance with extra energy.
meanings.sent4: The jouncing of the earthquake caused dishes to fall off the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The jouncing of the car on the rocky terrain was unsettling for the passengers.
